name: There`s No Way That`s True Podcast

episodes.title: How We Fell in Love in a Cult (and Survived to Tell It) | Ep 7 | There's no way that's true podcast
episodes.description:
This episode is one of my favorites yet — because my husband joins me! ❤️
We open up about how we met, how completely opposite our worlds were, and how forbidden our relationship was under the control of the IFB cult. From secret phone calls to being banned from seeing each other, to finally breaking free and building a life together — it’s funny, crazy, and a little unbelievable.

Even though the manipulation and control we faced were intense, we can finally laugh about it now. You’ll hear stories about what it was like trying to date under the IFB’s watchful eye, the wild rules we had to follow, and yes… the moment lizard people and tin foil hats somehow got involved 🤣

This episode is a mix of humor, healing, and hope — showing that love and resilience really can win, even in the most extreme circumstances.
